name: Keven Crooks

text: I normally love pizza hut but the pizza had no flavor when i ordered. I ordered stuffed crust with pepperoni. It lacked salt or something. Very plain cheese, sauce and crust. It's normally not like that

name: Grace Davison
text: Kind of mediocre pizza, the crust was too sweet. and I'm pretty sure an driver stayed in the car with a friend until he clocked out. Sorry.

name: M. Winborn
text: I love this Pizza Hut. My order is always correct, and the food is always hot. If you enjoy cinnamon rolls, you got to try the ones from Pizza Hut. I can literally eat the entire box. â€¦More

name: brody stevens
text: I think Pizza hut is great! It gets a bad wrap though, it seems to me. They have the most legit bread sticks ever! Also the salad bar is awesome. I really would give a 5 star review if the staff tried a little harder to be friendly. Other than that I'll be back.

name: Sloop Macgregor
text: I personally like Pizza hut.  Food quality at every location is near identical.  Midtown Broadway is carry out or delivery only and has a shorter wait time.

name: Mike Wilber
text: Would give them 0 stars if I could. Said it would be 40 minutes, didn't arrive for hour and a half. We called to check on order status earlier but got hung up on. Told the delivery guy to take it back with him.....called Marco's instead.     Pizza Hut is going down hill fast, don't waste your time and money.
